--------------------------------

const userA = {
  name: "kyo",
  age: 27,
};
const userB = {
  name: "min",
  age: 29,
  parent: userA,
};

console.log(userB.parent.name);
// kyo

console.log(userB["parent"]["name"]);
console.log(userB["parent"].name);
// kyo
